The nearest airport is Quito Mariscal Sucre International Airport, 162.5 km from Jardines Ambato.

comentarios.p_comentario: Leuke suite. Heerlijke jacuzzi. Personeel erg behulpzaam en flexibel met uitchecken. Grote tv met opties voor YouTube en Netflix! :) Jammer dat beamer het alleen via WiFi doet, gezien niet iedereen mobiele data heeft. Ontbijt zou top zijn met optie voor thee ipv koffie.

comentarios.nombreh_id: Cosmos Chill - Suite con jacuzzi y acuario
comentarios.p_comentario:
This unique room is very special, full of creativity and positive energy.  The décor is calming and literally makes you smile.  Modern bathroom is clean and comfortable.  King-size bed was an added bonus.  Soaking tub was a relaxing way to spend some time watching a series, a movie or F1; LOVED the well-taken care of fish tanks and the "tub table" for our laptop and drinks.  Breakfast served to the room was DELICIOUS and very well presented.  There is a great japanese-style table in the room with cushions to sit on while eating.  Closet with hangers was appreciated.  Parking is a tight squeeze, but available inside the gated land, right outside the room.  Hosts answered all of our requests and questions immediately and It was really the perfect place to call home with a great, central location while we explored Ambato and the surrounding areas for a long weekend getaway.
A hidden gem in the middle of Ambato for a relaxing getaway while exploring the area.
 A few extra towels would have made a difference in our comfort level due to the amount of time spent in water in the room.  I would also suggest more ventilation in the bathroom.  That said, the fan in the room was a good way to keep air moving, especially when opening the main door.  A little more instruction on the cool electronic elements in the room would have helped us enjoy them more (large TV, Alexa, and home theater system).  Finally, the Internet, while good enough for sending messages, could not support Netflix or streaming on our devices and meant that we used a lot of data.  None of these issues prevented us from enjoying our weekend, though, and are only mentioned to help improve something already very special.

comentarios.p_comentario:
Clean and beautifully decorated room. Large candelit bath (unused) and very nice hot shower. Large and comfortable bed. Perfect WiFi. Area felt very safe. Really well located next to the two best parks (with amazing topiary) we saw in all of Ambato. The atmosphere on Sundays is particularly great. Just a 20 minute walk into central Ambato. Hosts are charming too. We would not consider staying anywhere else in Ambato.
Exceptional

descripccion: Boasting a panoramic terrace with city views, spa facilities and an on-site gym, Emperador has rooms with chic décor and city views in Ambato. Guests can also enjoy an indoor swimming pool.Hotel Emperador has suites and rooms with air conditioning, flat screen TV and comfortable seating areas. Suites also feature hot tubs, kitchenettes and DVD players.An American breakfast with tropical fruits can be enjoyed daily and guests can enjoy regional dishes at the restaurant.Museo del Colegio Bolivar is 300 m away. The main bus station is 0.6 mi away. Car rental can be arranged and there is free private parking.Quito City is 85 mi from Emperador and shuttles to Latacunga Airport, 28 mi away, are possible for a fee.
direccion: Avenida Cevallos 1014, 180150 Ambato, Ecuador–Great location - show map

el desayuno No te cobran lo que dice Booking te suben el precio. me mintieron porque me dijeron que me suben debido a un impuesto municipal pero en la factura aparece que yo si una propina de 10$ y yo no doy propina.

No cobran la tarifa que indica Booking.com me cobraron de más y las chicas de recepción no se ponen de acuerdo al día siguiente me dijeron que efectivamente me han cobrado de más y cómo Justo tuve que quedarme otro día regrese al día siguiente para que me realicen el descuento respectivo y estaba la misma chica del día anterior y me dijo que no que no estaban cobrando el iva y que la tarifa estaba mal en Booking en fin ya no me quede la otra noche y nunca me devolvieron nada y me cobraron de más de lo que indica la aplicación.

Das eindrückliche Haus mit 170 - jährige Geschichte strahlt Ruhe und zeugt von einer gediegene Kolonialgeschichte. Das Personal ist äußerst Freunlich und Hilfsbereit. Das Essen im Restaurant war erstklassig. Es gibt nichts, worüber man sich beschweren könnte.

comentarios.p_comentario:
Breakfast, comfort, and location were average, nothing special. Stay at this hotel at your own risk.
I'll never go back, that's for certain!
 I returned to the hotel around mid-day. I found that the chambermaid left my room door, and a couple others, wide open for anyone to enter and take anything they wanted, since she was no-where around. There were no other employees on the floor either, with guest room doors left open. Lack of respect or concern for travelers possessions...cash, passport, laptops, etc. available for the taking. No cameras, no security.
El servicio es excelente, la habitación limpia al momento de ingresar y la limpieza del cuarto se hizo en el horario establecido, muy recomendable para los viajeros Todo estuvo bien me sentí a gusto
El excelente servicio y las instalaciónes impecables.
Atención, ducha, tina, desayuno, ubicación, edificio, ascensor, estilo, servicio. Todo estuvo bien

comentarios.p_comentario:
Everything
It was amazing. We enjoyed it a lot.
 The extra fee for the jacuzzi and that there were not enough pots and pans for cooking

Me encantó la comodidad es muy confortable, el jacuzzi es muy relajante, tiene un hermosa vista al cuidad, el balcón es muy lindo, la sala es amplía y confortable, todos los cuartos tienen cambios de luces. El anfitrión es muy amable, educado. 
Tuve una experiencia muy grata lo recomiendo ampliamente.
No me recibio a mi hora de llegada, tuve que buscar otro hospedaje

estaba todo limpio y el departamento está muy bien distribuido 
las camas cómodas, se pudo disfrutar de privacidad y no había ruido 
fácil acceso para llegar al centro 
Fernando siempre atento y pendiente 
regresaré !

The apartment was large with two bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a good stove and washer and dryer
Large apartment with good view but bad smell
 This apartment with a few small changes could be 5 star but I felt unhappy during my stay because the two floor drains in the bathroom were not properly vented and the apartment had a very strong sewer odor and also the apartment although near new with new appliances and furniture was already not very clean    The previous guests had left an opened bag of cooking oil etc and some items in the fridge and they were still there     The stairways to the apartment(which is on the fifth floor) were never cleaned during our 11 day stay       The apartment had no table to eat on and the bar top table had no bar stools so we had to eat while sitting on the couch which was brand new With the installation of drain vents and purchase of bar stools and better cleaning between visitors and of exterior stairways this apartment with city views would be first class but due to bad smell and lack of cleaning I would not stay here again

Everything
It was amazing. We enjoyed it a lot.
 The extra fee for the jacuzzi and that there were not enough pots and pans for cooking

Me encantó la comodidad es muy confortable, el jacuzzi es muy relajante, tiene un hermosa vista al cuidad, el balcón es muy lindo, la sala es amplía y confortable, todos los cuartos tienen cambios de luces. El anfitrión es muy amable, educado. 
Tuve una experiencia muy grata lo recomiendo ampliamente.
No me recibio a mi hora de llegada, tuve que buscar otro hospedaje

estaba todo limpio y el departamento está muy bien distribuido 
las camas cómodas, se pudo disfrutar de privacidad y no había ruido 
fácil acceso para llegar al centro 
Fernando siempre atento y pendiente 
regresaré !

The apartment was large with two bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a good stove and washer and dryer
Large apartment with good view but bad smell
 This apartment with a few small changes could be 5 star but I felt unhappy during my stay because the two floor drains in the bathroom were not properly vented and the apartment had a very strong sewer odor and also the apartment although near new with new appliances and furniture was already not very clean    The previous guests had left an opened bag of cooking oil etc and some items in the fridge and they were still there     The stairways to the apartment(which is on the fifth floor) were never cleaned during our 11 day stay       The apartment had no table to eat on and the bar top table had no bar stools so we had to eat while sitting on the couch which was brand new With the installation of drain vents and purchase of bar stools and better cleaning between visitors and of exterior stairways this apartment with city views would be first class but due to bad smell and lack of cleaning I would not stay here again

descripccion: Located in Ambato, 46.7 km from Tarabita Cable Car, Hotel Seny provides accommodations with free WiFi and free private parking. This 3-star hotel offers a concierge service. The property has a 24-hour front desk, dry cleaning services and organizing tours for guests.Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. All guest rooms include a closet.An American breakfast is available daily at Hotel Seny.Huachi Chico is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Ambato is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Quito Mariscal Sucre International Airport, 162.5 km from Hotel Seny.
direccion: Av. Rumiñahui y Av. Atahualpa, 180202 Ambato, Ecuador–Great location - show map

comentarios.p_comentario: NO HAY ASCENSOR , ESTOY RECIEN OPERADO Y NO PODIA SUBIR LAS MALETAS, EL PERSONAL DE RECEPCION LO HIZO, PERO ATIENDEN UNICAMENTE MUJERES Y LES FUE UN POCO DIFICIL EL ACCESO A LAS ESCALERAS

A simple hotel not far from the center of Ambato. Staff were friendly.
Very Good
 The parking was tiny and filled completely with cars. I worried about other cars damaging mine.
Bien ambiente y ubicación, excelente atención , limpieza, hay confianza .
la comodidad de la cama el estacionamiento muy pequeño
Personnel aimable.  Déjeuner copieux Couvertures poussiéreuses et plancher de salle de bain crasseux, bruyant la nuit
Limpieza, parqueadero, atención Incomodidad de almohadas

descripccion: Alojamiento En Ambato, a property with a garden, is located in Ambato, 45.1 km from Tarabita Cable Car, a 17-minute walk from Hacienda Huachi de Cobo, as well as 1.4 km from Hacienda Huachi de Bucheli. This apartment provides free private parking and a shared kitchen.This apartment has 1 bedroom, a living room and a fully equipped kitchen.Huachi Chico is a 16-minute walk from the apartment, while Ambato is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Quito Mariscal Sucre International Airport, 164.2 km from Alojamiento En Ambato.
direccion: Calle Payamino, 180215 Ambato, Ecuador–Excellent location – show map

comentarios.p_comentario: Muy bonito todo , limpio y una atención de la sra excelente.
La ubicación y limpieza La ducha no tenía suficiente agua
La limpieza y amabilidad No es que no me gustó, simplemente mi sugerencia es que la tv debería tener cable
El tamaño del departamento y lo cuidado q estaba. La cocina era enorme y muy completa. El sofá cama era muy cómodo. El parqueadero, ya que dependíamos de que nos abrieran.
El departamento está bien amoblado El departamento no tiene una salida independiente de la casa. La cama suena mucho
El espacio en el lugar El control exagerado del propitario
Es nuevo, limpio, zona segura No es independiente y aún no tienen completamente implementada la cocina

descripccion: Featuring a shared lounge and views of city, Hotel Tungurahua is located in Ambato, 48.3 km from Tarabita Cable Car. All rooms have a TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. The hotel has family rooms.At the hotel, rooms come with a closet. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while some rooms include a balcony.Ironing facilities, free private parking and a business center are available, as well as a 24-hour front desk.Popular points of interest near Hotel Tungurahua include Ambato, Santa Elena and Ficoa. The nearest airport is Quito Mariscal Sucre International Airport, 159.3 km from the accommodation.
direccion: Avenida Cevallos 0655 & Ayllón, 180103 Ambato, Ecuador–Excellent location – show map

comentarios.p_comentario: Una excelente ubicación y el personal se porto de primera Nada, todo estuvo perfecto

El personal, muy amables El hotel en sí es bastante deficiente en muchas áreas: mucho ruido gran parte del día, el olor que sale del baño por la alcantarilla es desagradable. Habitación 106. La habitación visualmente no es agradable, son pequeños detalles pero hacen la gran diferencia
La ubicación Las instalaciones tanto eléctricas  no funcionan  Las instalaciones del baño en mal estado  El suelo ya q tenia alfombra pero ya viejo  En si el hotel requiere de  mantenimiento

descripccion: Located 49.9 km from Tarabita Cable Car, Quinta Las Buganvillas has accommodations with a bar, a garden and a 24-hour front desk for your convenience.Fitted with a patio, the units feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries.The lodge provides a terrace.Augusto N. Martínez is 3.9 km from Quinta Las Buganvillas, while Atahualpa is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Quito Mariscal Sucre International, 157.7 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
direccion: Matanzas Bridgetown, 180106 Ambato, Ecuador–Excellent location – show map

comentarios.p_comentario:
Excelente desayuno.
Lo mejor en relacion Calidad / Precio.
El ambiente: estas en el campo en la  ciudad

a green oasis at the limits of Ambato, absolutely quiet, allows you to sleep wonderfully with open windows, interesting gardening project with many flowers and trees, very nice and helpful staff (providing even hot water warmers for the bed) very clean, very nice bathroom and shower with very hot water. a wonderful alternative to staying in the center. many restaurants at a 10 minute drive.
wonderful rest
 most rooms offer only view to a wall, no breakfast included, thus priced a little bit on the upper side compared even to major cities, but if you look for an absolutely quiet place in an otherwise bustling city go for it.

Hermoso el lugar, limpio, un desayuno excelente. El personal amable, un lugar fuera de la ciudad, cerca a izamba. En la parroquia la Península. Encontre una lavandería cerca, estación de bus cerca a la terminal  Ingahurco Norte de Ambato. Maravilloso el lugar bien cuidado. Vale la pena pagar por quienes brindan excelencia. Sabanas limpias, toallas nuevas. Me encanto la cortesía de la casa un jugo caliente de moras y otras frutas.  El lugar es tranquilo y cálido. Los exteriores  del lugar tienen donde sentarse, caminar sobretodo observar la naturaleza.. El precio mencionado en booking para mi no era igual que para el dueño. Realmente ese problema es de booking. Tengo la captura de cuanto debia pagar pero al dueño en el. sistema le  aparecía otro valor.
Lugar acojedor como una Quinta o chalet
Muy lindo lugar, las habitaciones muy cómodas, excelente servicio del personal y el trato con el dueño de la quinta inmejorable.  Lo recomiendo totalmente, volveremos a llegar sin duda !

La atención del anfitrión (sr figueroa) y el resto del personal!! Además de que las instalaciones son maravillosas!! Los detalles, el agua de moras en cada habitación, las fomenteras lista cuando llegas a descansar, son detalles minúsculos pero que te dejan un maravilloso recuerdo de tu estancia... Volveremos... Sin duda alguna!!
Todo. La propiedad es hermosa. Una finca demasiado bonita. Áreas verdes, cultivos de toda clase. Un pedacito de campo en la ciudad. Hermosa.

descripccion: Hotel de la Peña is located in Ambato, within 48.3 km of Tarabita Cable Car and 3.7 km of Augusto N. Martínez. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The property has a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen for guests.Popular points of interest near the hotel include Ambato, Santa Elena and Ficoa. The nearest airport is Quito Mariscal Sucre International Airport, 159.3 km from Hotel de la Peña.
direccion: Rocafuerte Tomas Sevilla, 180205 Ambato, Ecuador–Good location – show map

comentarios.p_comentario: ruime kamer de douche was niet schoon
Nada Que no tiene puerta de entrada y pasan cerrado

Céntrico
Servicio de Cable
Personal atento La cama....fea Cama ubicada en medio de dos columnas, impedía el movimiento La habitación, en un piso muy elevado, para nosotros Hotel ubicado en zona de comerciantes....complicado acceso y salida.
Habitación amplia Baño incómodo y el agua no estaba caliente
Buena habitación y buena atención El lugar donde esta ubicado, nos la mejor zona de Ambato, y en la madrugada había mucha escandalo. Adicionalmente el parqueadero no es exactamente en el hotel

This is a typical highland town hotel in Ecuador, no frills, but great value and actually very comfortable. Bed and hot shower, new towels every day, good entertainment package. The location not far from the town center, and also a couple of blocks from a market (great for buying fruit). Actually on the town market day the market spreads a bit and is happening right under the window - a lot of stuff going for a dollar, you certainly hear it, but I found it colorful more than anything else.
Great value, good comfort
 The hotel asks for bank transfer of half of the price once you book - no biggie if you have a bank account in Ecuador, but I would not fancy making transfers from abroad (normally that attracts extra cost). Just showing up on their doorstep and paying directly in cash however solves that issue easily.

Bon emplacement Chambre petite, vetuste et mal insonorise.  La chambre donnant sur la rue du marché il est impossible de dormir sans boule quies. Tres mauvais rapport qualite prix. Plus de 40usd pour une chambre valant a peine 20usd
era cómodo no nos informaron que no tenían parqueadero a pesar de avisarles con anticipación. Cuando preguntamos nos afirmaron tener y al llegar tuvimos que pagar extra por un parqueadero

descripccion: Featuring city views, MODERNO DEPARTAMENTO DE ESTRENO EN FICOA AMBATO has accommodations with a terrace and a balcony, around a 18-minute walk from Ambatillo. Located a 18-minute walk from Hacienda Granada, the property provides a garden and free private parking.The apartment features 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a patio with garden views.Santa Elena is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Ficoa is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Quito Mariscal Sucre International Airport, 162.5 km from MODERNO DEPARTAMENTO DE ESTRENO EN FICOA AMBATO.

descripccion: Featuring a patio with garden views, barbecue facilities and a terrace, Hermosa casa vacacional en Ambato sector Pinllo can be found in Ambato, close to Santa Elena and one kilometer from Ficoa. Located 49.9 km from Tarabita Cable Car, the property has a garden and free private parking.The vacation home is fitted with 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and an oven. Towels and bed linen are offered.Ambato is one kilometer from the vacation home, while Hacienda Granada is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Quito Mariscal Sucre International Airport, 160.9 km from Hermosa casa vacacional en Ambato sector Pinllo.

descripccion: Residencia CLARA ELENA is located in Ambato, 2.9 km from Huachi Chico, 3.2 km from Santa Elena, and 3.2 km from Ficoa. With free private parking, the property is 48.3 km from Tarabita Cable Car and 2.7 km from Ambato.The bed and breakfast also provides a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with shower.A continental breakfast is available daily at the bed and breakfast.Hacienda Granada is 3.9 km from Residencia CLARA ELENA, while Ambatillo is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Quito Mariscal Sucre International Airport, 162.5 km from the accommodation.

comentarios.p_comentario: Me encantó lo acogedora que es la residencia y lo amable que es la dueña.
El estilo del alojamiento y que la persona que nos atendió fue super amable y cordial con nosotros. Super recomendado el alojamiento👍🏼

El sector es exquisito, hay restaurantes, bares y es una zona residencial segura. El desayuno y la atención de la propietaria que vive aquí fue muy buena; aunque no entrega las llaves está dispuesta ha abrir a la hora que se le llame. Es una estadía recomendada para familia o pareja.  La señora está dispuesta ayudarte ( a nosotros se nos daños el carro y ayudó a conseguir mecánico). 5 estrellas. no tengo comentario.
